enableLinter.title: Enable Linter
enableLinter.description: Enable error checking for item filters.

enableAlertDecorations.title: Enable Sound Decorations
enableAlertDecorations.description: Enable the gutter decoration for rules with a sound.

enableSetColorDecorations.title: Enable Color Decorations
enableSetColorDecorations.description: Enable the gutter decoration for rules with a color.

enableLeague.title: League-specific Items
enableLeague.description: Allow the use of league-specific items within item filters.

enableLegacy.title: Legacy Items
enableLegacy.description: Allow the use of items that are unobtainable in the current temporary leagues.

enableRecipe.title: Vendor Recipe Items
enableRecipe.description: Allow the use of items which are only obtainable through vendor recipes.

classWhitelist.title: Item Class Whitelist
classWhitelist.description: Allow the following additonal item classes to be used within filter files. Multiple entries should be separated by a comma.

baseWhitelist.title: Item Base Whitelist
baseWhitelist.description: Allow the following additonal base types to be used within filter files. Multiple entries should be separated by a comma.

enableExtraSuggestions.title: Extra Suggestions
enableExtraSuggestions.description: Enable extra suggestions, such as the ones for map tiers.

enableRightLabel.title: Right Label
enableRightLabel.description: Enable the right label, which provides additional information.

enableWarnings.title: Warnings
enableWarnings.description: Enable linter warnings within the editor.
